msg.msgText:
A "TrustedCertificate" composite object can be deleted using the "delete" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver delete TrustedCertificate help imaserver delete TrustedCertificate "TrustedCertificate=certificatename" "SecurityProfileName=securityprofilename"
EXAMPLE: imaserver delete TrustedCertificate "TrustedCertificate=trustCert.pem" "SecurityProfileName=secProfile1"

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
